text: "My Checheno-Ingushetia" (, , ) was the anthem of the Checheno-Ingush ASSR, an ASSR within the Russian SFSR. ==Lyrics== Russian originalĞ¢ĞµĞºÑÑ‚ Ğ¿ĞµÑĞ½Ğ¸ Ğ“Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ½ Ğ§ĞµÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¾-Ğ˜Ğ½Ğ³ÑƒÑˆĞµÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ§Ğ˜ĞĞ¡Ğ¡Ğ  - Ğ§ĞµÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¾-Ğ˜Ğ½Ğ³ÑƒÑˆĞµÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ. TekstovNet.ru. Transliteration Singable English translation I Ancient olden mountains, fields of golden wheat sheaves, Dear lands of infinite expanse. Proudly standing plane trees, countless weighty sheep flocks, ğ„† Checheno-Ingushetia of mine! ğ„‡ II Oil- pumping stations, people's hearts of fire, Loyal to October's glory deeds, Motherland of horsemen, ever famous heroes â€“ ğ„† Checheno-Ingushetia of mine! ğ„‡ III Wartime shining glory, ardent labour efforts, Strong and close-knit Soviet family, Young and never-aging, Motherland republic â€“ ğ„† Checheno-Ingushetia of mine! ğ„‡ IV Lenin's flag all hours, shining there above us, Mountain land gets better every day, Communism is dawning, that's where my land's going ğ„† Checheno-Ingushetia of mine! ğ„‡ ==References== Category:Anthems of Soviet Socialist Republics Category:Chechen anthems
title: My Checheno-Ingushetia
